markdownRemark.html: Nestled in the foothills of Marbella with spectacular views of the Mediterranean. This is a very nice par 3 challenging golf course for both beginners and more experienced golfers. The clubhouse serves good food and the service is excellent.

frontmatter.title: Monte Paraíso Golf
frontmatter.description: Monte Paraíso Golf - Nestled in the foothills of Marbella with spectacular views of the Mediterranean. This is a very nice par 3 challenging golf course for both beginners and more experienced golfers. The clubhouse serves good food and the service is excellent.
frontmatter.address: Camino de Camoján s/n, Marbella, 29600 Málaga, Spain
tags: Top golf courses Costa del Sol
